content.text: Order Services enables custom jewelry manufacturing requests with direct supplier integration. Processing time ranges from 5-15 business days depending on complexity.
All custom orders undergo mandatory quality checks including purity testing, weight verification, and design compliance before dispatch.
Base fee of ₹5,999/month plus 3.5% commission on each completed order. Rush orders incur additional 15% surcharge.
Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours of placement without penalty. After production begins, cancellation fees of 25% apply.
All disputes will be resolved through arbitration as per Indian Arbitration Act. Jurisdiction limited to Mumbai courts only.
Standard delivery within 7-10 business days. Express delivery available at additional cost. Insurance included for all shipments above ₹50,000.
Returns accepted within 7 days of delivery for manufacturing defects only. Custom orders are non-refundable unless there are quality issues.
Minimum order value of ₹25,000 required. Bulk discounts available for orders above ₹5,00,000.
